snippet: After a two-day search, a Mexican nuclear official said the missing radioactive isotope that had been aboard a stolen truck was found.
lead_paragraph: After a two-day search, a Mexican nuclear official said the missing radioactive isotope that had been aboard a stolen truck was found.
abstract: Mexican nuclear officials say missing radioactive material on truck that was hijacked by thieves has been recovered.

headline.main: Truck With Radioactive Load Is Recovered in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Truck With Lethal Load Is Recovered in Mexico

byline.contributor: Randal C. Archibold reported from Mexico City, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Matthew L. Wald and Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington, and Patrick J. Lyons from New York.
byline.original: By RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD and RICK GLADSTONE
